sentence: Harold made sure we had everything we needed from the breakfast buffet
This location was the best as far as shopping Malls Movies Eating relaxing and just doing nothing
The facility was well kept and although we could not take advantage of the dining facilities due to other arrangements we were pleased with how they looked and the menu selections
Location cost staff free shuttle within 3 miles restaurant outside sitting areas Close to shopping restaurants movies
I very much enjoyed my hotel stay the hotel was located near great shopping and restaurants
Rooms are spacious and comfortable breakfast is served hot and tasty
The bar has a great selection and the staff is friendly and attentive
On the plus side one of the mornings we had breakfast at the buffet and the service was so AMAZING
Breakfast is great bedding is comfortable and always a big welcome when you arrive
The chef made scrambled eggs during dinner time for our kid which was very nice
The pics are views of lobby kitchen bar area and down the steps are the meeting rooms
Breakfast first day left a bit to be desired because it was very busy so attention of staff was beyond slow
There were cold breakfast options available but they did not even have the lights in the breakfast space on before 7
The safety bar in shower was not put in correct location unles you were going to straddle the toilet to get in out no way you can hold onto it while in shower
Although you have to buy breakfast for 1295 it is worth the price

Shuttle service advertised but poorly managed room not properly cleaned prior guest soap bar in bathtub etc front desk staff poorly trained arrogant and uncaring no management oversite and presence to resolve guest concerns
Not to mention how unkept the bar and tables are at 9 am
did not like that they did not have continental breakfast
There was no real bar and the restaurant was subpar and far too expensive
The breakfast did n’t meet my expectations
